content.text:
# 2025 Independence Bowl

The 2025 Independence Bowl is a college football bowl game that is scheduled to be played on December 30, 2025, at Independence Stadium located in Shreveport, Louisiana. The 49th annual Independence Bowl game will feature a team from Big 12 Conference and a team for the Conference USA. The game is scheduled to begin at 12:00 p.m. CST and will air on ESPN. The Independence Bowl will be one of the 2025–26 bowl games that will be concluding the 2025 FBS football season. The bowl game will be sponsored by engineering services company Radiance Technologies, and the game will be officially known as the Radiance Technologies Independence Bowl.
Teams
Based on conference tie-ins, the game will feature a team from Big 12 Conference and a team for the Conference USA.
